title: [Large-scale] System-Based Anatomy Education Design: Peripheral Nervous System Education Using Interactive Learning Objects

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental anatomy and physiological concepts
context.additional_context: Personalized learning environment construction using digital devices, enabling real-time interaction via VR simulations

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify and explain the peripheral nervous system structure using 3D VR simulation

Learners can analyze 10 interactive patient case studies (IPCs) to derive associations between neurological disease symptoms and structural abnormalities with over 80% accuracy and produce a report meeting at least four of five standardized evaluation checklist criteria.
Functional associations between body systems can be derived with over 80% accuracy using system-based lecture notes
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
